mapper.select:
select ini.id, ini.expert_id, ini.base_id, ini.`type`, ini.create_date, ini.enterprise_id, ini.del_flag, ini.status, ei2.name as enterpriseName, ei2.abbreviation, ei2.nature, ed.logo, ei.name as expertName, ei.images as expertImages from interview_info ini left join expert_info ei on (ei.id = ini.expert_id) left join enterprise_info ei2 on (ei2.id = ini.enterprise_id) left join enterprise_detail ed on (ed.enterprise_id = ei2.id) where 1 = 1
AND ei2.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{interviewInfo.enterpriseName},'%')
AND ei2.abbreviation LIKE CONCAT('%',#{interviewInfo.abbreviation},'%')
AND ei.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{interviewInfo.expertName},'%')
AND ei.user_id = #{interviewInfo.expertId}
AND ei2.user_id = #{interviewInfo.enterpriseId}
order by ini.create_date desc
